start_welcome:
ğŸ‘‹ Welcome! To use this bot, please provide your OpenRouter API key using `/setkey YOUR_API_KEY`.

Use `/help` to see all available commands.
start_welcome_authorized:
ğŸ‘‹ Welcome back! You are already authorized.

Your current settings:
Model: `{model}`
System Prompt: `{systemPrompt}`

Use `/help` to see available commands.
key_required: âš ï¸ Please set your OpenRouter API key first using `/setkey YOUR_API_KEY`.

ğŸ¤– Please select an AI model using `/setmodel MODEL_ID` (e.g., `openai/gpt-4o`).

You can find model IDs on the OpenRouter website.

system_prompt_reset_success: âœ… System prompt reset to default.

help:
ğŸ¤– *Available Commands:*

â€¢ /start - Start the bot
â€¢ /setkey [API_KEY] - Save your OpenRouter API key
â€¢ /changemodel - Choose a new AI model
â€¢ /setsystemprompt [PROMPT] - Set custom system prompt (empty to reset)
â€¢ /setpersona [name] - Set predefined persona (e.g. default, coder)
â€¢ /setlang [en|id] - Set preferred language
â€¢ /resetsettings - Clear all settings
â€¢ /ask [QUESTION] - Ask the AI (remembers history)
â€¢ /newchat - Start new conversation
â€¢ /search [QUERY] - Web search
â€¢ /togglesearch - Enable/disable web search
â€¢ /managetoken - Manage your API token
â€¢ /help - Show this message
token_revoked: âœ… Your API token has been revoked
token_regenerated: âœ… A new API token has been generated
